Structs/Mail.html.name: Mail
Structs/Mail.html.abstract: Represents an email that can be sent through an SMTP instance.

Structs/SMTP.html.name: SMTP
Structs/SMTP.html.abstract: Represents a handle to connect to and send emails to an SMTP server.

Structs/User.html.name: User
Structs/User.html.abstract: Represents a sender or receiver of an email.
